page.title: 15Wetwang,Employment.
page.content: Although alot of people are employed in agriculture in one way or another,some people live in Wetwang and go to other places to work.From Wetwang it is not too difficult to get to Driffield,York,Beverley and Hull if you have got your own transport or if you can share with a friend. We asked the children in our class what jobs their parents did if they did not work on farms.They said they did these jobs:delivery driver,lorry driver,continental lorry driver,army driver,singer,television engineer,auctioneer,home help,cleaner in the pub,market trader,student, waitress.Some mums are on the dole or are a housewife or having a baby. Most people are employed and only the teenagers are unemployed and go on YTS jobs or have to go to college.
